# 定义函数来打印树形结构
print_tree <- function(path, indent="") {
  # 获取当前目录的内容
  content <- list.files(path)
  
  # 遍历当前目录的内容
  for (item in content) {
    # 构建完整路径
    full_path <- file.path(path, item)
    
    # 打印缩进和当前项目
    cat(indent, "└─ ", item, "\n", sep="")
    
    # 如果是目录，则递归调用该函数
    if (file.info(full_path)$isdir) {
      print_tree(full_path, paste(indent, "│   ", sep=""))
    }
  }
}

# 指定目录路径
directory_path <- "D:/GitHub_programe/GitHub/SPE_Database/4_Data_Extraction/4_2_Open_Data"

# 打印树形结构
print_tree(directory_path)
